p: In other research we found that the oleoresins of Myristica fragrans (Egypt) have α-copaene (0.63%) [ 8] and trans- α-bergamotene (0.1%) [ 39]. The compound of cubebol was found in Piper Cuberica Linn. essential oil and oleoresins [ 40] and Chromolaena odorata essential oil (8.6%) [ 41]. Cubenene was obtained in Caryopteris incana essential oil (9.7%) [ 42]. The γ-amorphene (0.03–0.78%) and cis- α-bergamotene (0.08–0.1%) were obtained by using magnesium aluminometasilicate in hydrodistillation (HD2–HD3) ( Figure 3).
